channel.title: How could you stop people from using commands when in a designated area?
channel.description: Say I didn't wan't players using a command in a jail cell... so how do you go about doing this? Say you define in an area, and a requirement to use a command is not being in that area. But how?

item.title: How could you stop people from using commands when in a designated area?

Say I didn’t wan’t players using a command in a jail cell… so how do you go about doing this? Say you define in an area, and a requirement to use a command is not being in that area. But how?
